mapper.insert: insert into media_entity ( folder, name, status, mdate, content_type, put_content_type, content_length) values ( #{folder}, #{name}, #{status}, #{mdate}, #{content_type}, #{put_content_type}, #{content_length})
mapper.select: select e.* from media_entity as e where e.folder = #{folder} order by e.status desc, e.name asc
